creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 27113
Script to fix SVN properties

Attached file fixes some SVN property errors in TOMCAT_7_0_15 (and presumably trunk).

Fixed in r1132569: svn:eol-style on TesterAccessLogValve.java

Regarding the rest of the patch that sets svn:keywords property on the files in /java/org/apache/tomcat/util/bcel/classfile/ -- it is wrong. None of those files uses any keywords. Thus there is no need to set this property there.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text:
My checking script detected that the wrong syntax was used for the svn:keywords.

The keywords are currently set to

"Author Date Id Revision"

rather than the correct

Author Date Id Revision

The leading and trailing quotes should not be present, as they stop Author and Revision keywords from working (if present).

It's confusing to have the invalid keywords in the propery, so I suggest that the properties are fixed or deleted.
creator: sebb@apache.org
